Posts.Content: Hi Lucy I am post menopausal having had an hysterectomy a few years back. Since diagnosed with her2 and estrogen positive cancer in may this year. I have had chemo, mastectomy recently. I am on herceptin now and have just started taking anastrozole also known as armidex which are one of the AI for post menopausal women. My oncologist said tamoxifen would be no Use for me. I've only started taking them this week so too early for side effects! Hope this helpsÂ
Posts.Title: Should I be switched from tamoxifen to a aromatase inhibitor post...

Posts.Content: I put my tea towel in the oven with the dinner until luckily my 7 year old spotted it...:)
